name: search_documents_assistant
description: Ask the backend to search documents and return relevant chunks and a concise summary. Include filters when available. If the assistant cannot provide the end-user's UUID, the backend will use the assistant fallback UUID.

query.description: Concise user search query. If the assistant has a conversation, extract the user's last question and put it here.

user.description: Optional object with the end-user identity. If absent the backend uses the assistant fallback UUID.

conversation.description: Optional conversation/messages structure. If messages array is supplied, the backend will attempt to use the last user message as the query.
